line_1: The Wire to curl, the close-indented Comb
line_2: To call the Locks that lightly wander, home;

line_1: Some steeve the honey, some erect the comb;
line_2: Again to diff'rent works returning home,

line_1: With which the artist builds her comb,
line_2: And keeps all tight and warm at home:

line_1: "Seize, seize the honey, and lay waste the comb!
line_2: Rebellion buzzes thro' the straw-built dome —
